Text: need hr notice we require them to recall by AM for gas to be flowed the following day

Re Algon Billing Issueslooked at these and said that the Boston releases were done at Peak but the rereleases were done at Seasonal I would call Trish to discuss possibly terminating and redoing the rereleases Enjoyed lunch Steph Chris Germany ChrisGermany enroncom AM To Stephanie L EC cc Brenda H Fletcher Subject Algon Billing Issues Hi Steph I dont know if this question should go to you If not please forward it on to the right person and let me know who that is The reservation volumes on the seasonal contracts do not look correct The demand charge looks OK its the demand volume which is not calculating correctly And ENA has released this capacity to Energy Express effective June Please look at the following contractsdeals Contract Deal Comment Boston releasing to CES CES releasing to ENA ENA releasing to Energy Express Contract Deal Comment Boston releasing to CES CES releasing to ENA ENA releasing to Energy Express Thanks
